title: Where is Clash
body:
it said clash is live when I logged on but theres not tab for it?
just curious to if it has certain times like Draft pick does

replies.body:
Clash is weekends only, once every 2 weeks and it opens on the 20th (with games starting on the 25th).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFmJynSYT1k&feature=youtu.be
